entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Stony Plain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 15.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Plain 6:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Temperature: 15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 31 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
